title: Google\Cloud\Optimization\V1\TransitionAttributes
name: TransitionAttributes
description:
Specifies attributes of transitions between two consecutive visits on a route. Several TransitionAttributes may apply to the same transition: in that case, all extra costs add up and the strictest constraint or limit applies (following natural "AND" semantics).

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.optimization.v1.TransitionAttributes

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.src_tag
params.description: Tags defining the set of (src->dst) transitions these attributes apply to. A source visit or vehicle start matches iff its [VisitRequest.tags][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Shipment.VisitRequest.tags] or [Vehicle.start_tags][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Vehicle.start_tags] either contains src_tag or does not contain excluded_src_tag (depending on which of these two fields is non-empty).

params.name: data.excluded_src_tag
params.description: See src_tag. Exactly one of src_tag and excluded_src_tag must be non-empty.

params.name: data.dst_tag
params.description: A destination visit or vehicle end matches iff its [VisitRequest.tags][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Shipment.VisitRequest.tags] or [Vehicle.end_tags][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Vehicle.end_tags] either contains dst_tag or does not contain excluded_dst_tag (depending on which of these two fields is non-empty).

params.name: data.excluded_dst_tag
params.description: See dst_tag. Exactly one of dst_tag and excluded_dst_tag must be non-empty.

params.name: data.cost
params.description: Specifies a cost for performing this transition. This is in the same unit as all other costs in the model and must not be negative. It is applied on top of all other existing costs.

params.name: data.cost_per_kilometer
params.description: Specifies a cost per kilometer applied to the distance traveled while performing this transition. It adds up to any [Vehicle.cost_per_kilometer][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Vehicle.cost_per_kilometer] specified on vehicles.

params.name: data.distance_limit
params.description: Specifies a limit on the distance traveled while performing this transition. As of 2021/06, only soft limits are supported.

params.name: data.delay
params.description: Specifies a delay incurred when performing this transition. This delay always occurs after finishing the source visit and before starting the destination visit.
